sections.heading: Authorization for regionalized service systemSection 41-81-3 - Contracts with and grants to health-care providers
sections.text:
The State Department of Health is authorized to coordinate the development and implementation of a regionalized system of perinatal health-care services.Laws, 1987, ch. 514, § 1, eff. 7/1/1987.

The State Department of Health is authorized to coordinate the development and implementation of a regionalized system of perinatal health-care services.Laws, 1987, ch. 514, § 1, eff. 7/1/1987.

The State Department of Health is authorized to coordinate the development and implementation of a regionalized system of perinatal health-care services.

Laws, 1987, ch. 514, § 1, eff. 7/1/1987.

sections.heading: Contracts with and grants to health-care providers
sections.text:
The State Department of Health is authorized to enter into contracts with and provide grants to health-care providers in order to implement a statewide regionalization program.Laws, 1987, ch. 514, § 2, eff. 7/1/1987.

The State Department of Health is authorized to enter into contracts with and provide grants to health-care providers in order to implement a statewide regionalization program.Laws, 1987, ch. 514, § 2, eff. 7/1/1987.

Laws, 1987, ch. 514, § 2, eff. 7/1/1987.
